page.title: 09The Canal at Stone
page.content: As the Trent and Mersey canal passes through Stone,we went along to see it. In the olden times the canal was used for pulling cargo.Now it is used for holidays and pleasure.On the canal there are two bridges and four locks. The Southern lock is called the Star lock and the Northern lock is called the Top lock.There is a shop which sells equipment, boats, sweets, ropes, shoes and maps.We questioned three people.Two of them were on holiday and the other person was also just going for pleasure.The Star Inn is by the Star Lock and the Rising Sun Inn is by the Top Lock.There are two boat yards in Stone where boats can be hired for holiday cruising.
